title: ban
body:
hello  

i got ban .... why i did?  

i never inting and trolling 

plz i want to play this account

replies.body: I have been banned 8 Times, Im sure riot don't just ban people .. Gotta stop spamming Cao ni ma and sha bi

You should have received a reform card in client with the reason which offers the reason for your ban.

If you can't see the reform card, check your email, as you may have received a copy there too.

If that fails, submit a ticket to players support. It may take a day or two for them to get back to you, so be patient.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
actually i dont understand last sentence what do u mean
It means if you submit a ticket to riot about your report, it might take a while for them to respond.
Its the request to have the issue looked at, but just like when waiting in a line with a TICKET you need to wait until your ticket number is called to be served.
Click the link. Copy and paste what you said in your post and click send.
